item.title:
In @ScienceAdvances, researchers introduce a paper-like, battery-free sensor that uses #AI to assess wound healing.

item.description:
In this segment, @tegmark argues that more intelligence is not always beneficial, saying that the world would have been worse off if Hitler had been smarter.
Max is a professor at MIT. His job, like mine, is to increase the intelligence of students and other humans.

item.title: Thank you for calling our attention to our faulty presentation of the NHTSA data. We agree, it's hard to judge the meaning of relative numbers of crashes without knowing variables like time driven or miles driven, and this data isn't included in the NHTSA report. +
